channel.title: Chest problem
channel.description: Hi, Is there anybody that can help me figure out how i make a chest were you gamble from like, you click the chest and you spend 100k if you click it and you try and gamble to get items or cash? please help me.

item.title: Chest problem
item.dc:creator: @thugscape thugscape
item.description:
@thugscape wrote:

If that doesnt work. Pm me. Ill spend some more time working on it. If you ever need help coding. I can code pretty dang good.

                  boolean/true

case (chest id):
if(whateverTimer == 0) // create a timer so they can’t just keep doing it if you like
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 959959)==false) { // if the player doesn’t have the cash
sendMessage(“Need money’);
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 100000)==true) { // if the player does
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 100000); // remove the cash
sendMessage(”");
addItem(Item2.randomchest(), 1); // create a method to give back an item randomly
sendMessage(“You have to wait 2 hours to gamble again.”);
whateverTimer = 7200; // this would add two hours to your timer
break;

item.title: Chest problem
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

You would have to make it check if the player has 100k and if he does, create a method and call it to give back a random item… It would be something like this

case (chest id): if(whateverTimer == 0) // create a timer so they can't just keep doing it if you like if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 100000)==false) { // if the player doesn't have the cash sendMessage("'); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 100000)==true) { // if the player does deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 100000); // remove the cash sendMessage(""); addItem(Item2.randomchest(), 1); // create a method to give back an item randomly sendMessage("You have to wait 2 hours to gamble again."); whateverTimer = 7200; // this would add two hours to your timer break;

You obviously can’t just copy and paste that, but that would be a way to do it. That’s a pretty shitty way in my opinion though so I would make it a better way. I’m just lazy…

Read full topic
